page.title: 07A FARMER'S WIFE IN PLAISH
page.content: Many older farmers believe that farmer's sons should marry farmer's daughters. Not fitting into this category, I often think they may be right. As a family business it has it's ups and downs and money is short as it is all ploughed back into the business. It can also be very lonely, that is when I'm not inundated with temporary work-hands demanding meals, or piles of sandwiches and cups of tea. Shopping is also rather a chore and requires a little planning as the nearest shop is 8 miles away. It is truly a rare occasion when we go out together for the day, but despite all of this we would not swap the fresh air and sunny days we enjoy for anything else.
